# Magic UI

> Beautifully designed landing page components built with React & Tailwind CSS.

This file provides LLM-friendly entry points to documentation and examples.

## Components

- [code block](https://magicui.design/docs/components/code-block): A component for code block with syntax highlighting.
- [modal](https://magicui.design/docs/components/modal): A component for modal.
- [pro-table](https://magicui.design/docs/components/pro-table): A component for pro-table.
- [use ai](https://magicui.design/docs/components/use-ai): A hook for ai
- [zoomable image](https://magicui.design/docs/components/zoomable-image): A component for zoomable image.

## Examples

- [code-block-demo](https://github.com/magicuidesign/magicui/blob/main/example/code-block-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [use-ai-hook-demo](https://github.com/magicuidesign/magicui/blob/main/example/use-ai-hook-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [Zoomable Image Demo](https://github.com/magicuidesign/magicui/blob/main/example/zoomable-image-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [Modal Demo](https://github.com/magicuidesign/magicui/blob/main/example/modal-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [ProTable Demo](https://github.com/magicuidesign/magicui/blob/main/example/pro-table-demo.tsx): Example usage

## Optional

- [Repository](https://github.com/magicuidesign/magicui): Source code and issues
- [Sitemap](https://magicui.design/sitemap.xml): Indexable pages
